data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient.
Aurelien Petit signals a throw-in for Lorient, close to Lens's area.
Lens drives forward and Florian Sotoca gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 6, Quentin Boisgard (Lorient) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Lorient.
Corentin Jean (Lens) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Gael Kakuta for Lens gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sylvain Marveaux (Lorient) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrian Grbic is on target to give Lorient a 1-0 advantage.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jean-Louis Leca.
In the minute 19, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Jean-Louis Leca for Lens is back on the field again.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lens throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 21, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Florian Sotoca for Lens who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Lens are coming forward and Gael Kakuta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Lens's Florian Sotoca is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick Lens.
Lens have a dangerous throw-in.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Julien Laporte (Lorient) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 31, Lens have been given a penalty at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir...
Throw-in Lens.
Goal! The away team are now level through a Gael Kakuta penalty.
In the minute 33, Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Lens to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 33, Lens are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! Facundo Medina gives Lens a 1-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Florian Sotoca.
In the minute 36, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Lens's half.
In the minute 37, Lorient's Fabien Lemoine gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Aurelien Petit awards Lens a goal kick.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 39, In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens's Loic Bade goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Lens needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Lorient.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Lens's half.
In the minute 45, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
The first-half is over.
Lorient's Stephane Diarra has been booked in Lorient.
In the minute 46, Aurelien Petit has blown to start the second-half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in Lorient.
Laurent Abergel is replacing Stephane Diarra for the home team.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Lorient capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Yannick Cahuzac (Lens) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Lens.
In Lorient Lorient attack through Houboulang Mendes. The finish is off target, however.
Aurelien Petit awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Lorient.
In Lorient, Jeremy Morel (Lorient) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
In the minute 55, Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Lens make their first substitution with Clement Michelin replacing Jonathan Clauss.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Ignatius Kpene Ganago replacing Corentin Jean.
In the minute 59, Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Lens's half.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 62, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Lens extend their lead to 1-3 through Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Great play from Florian Sotoca to set up the goal.
In the minute 64, Enzo Le Fee is on a sub for Sylvain Marveaux for Lorient.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 65, Lorient needs to be cautious. Lens have an attacking throw-in.
Enzo Le Fee (Lorient) has received a first yellow card.
Lorient have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Lorient.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 68, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Perez is replacing Yannick Cahuzac for Lens at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Gael Kakuta with Tony Mauricio.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lens close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, Florian Sotoca (Lens) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lens to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 73, Lens's Cheick Oumar Doucoure breaks free at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Umut Bozok is replacing Fabien Lemoine for the home team.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 77, In Lorient Lens drive forward through Tony Mauricio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient.
In the minute 79, Loic Bade is booked for the away team.
Quentin Boisgard of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Lens's Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 82, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Houboulang Mendes with Trevoh Chalobah. This is the fourth substitution made today by Christophe Pelissier.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Lens’s Jean-Louis Leca is on his feet again at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Jean-Louis Leca is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The away team replace Ismael Boura with Issiaga Sylla.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Lens.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Lens's half.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Lorient have been given a penalty...
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Throw-in Lorient.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
The match has come to a close in Lorient. The final score is 2-3.
Loic Bade in Lens has been yellow-carded a second time by Aurelien Petit and is being sent off.
Yoane Wissa's spot-kick reduces the deficit 2-3.
